answers.answer: First thing, find someone to talk to.  You just moved.  People don't know you.  Try to get to know someone.  Second, you're animals deaths are not fun.  I've had two dogs and two horses.  They were my only friends.  And after I started getting close to them, they died.  It's horrible to have happen. And third, crying for little reasons i think may be something to do with the hormones.  I went through that too.  Still do here and there.  And fourth, choose a friend who won't pin you to the floor.  don't give up.  You can get through this :)
